wikipedia_page.main: Adam Mitchell (born 18 October 1993) is an English professional footballer who plays for Spennymoor Town, as a winger. He began his career at Premier League side Sunderland, for whom he made one professional appearance.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign Premier League players

response: *Adam Mitchell (footballer, born 1908), Scottish professional footballer for Bradford City and Wrexham
*Adam Mitchell (footballer, born 1993), English professional footballer for Sunderland
*Adam Mitchell (Doctor Who), a fictional character in the British science fiction television series Doctor Who
*Adam Mitchell (ice hockey) (born 1982), Canadian ice hockey player
